remarks: The "subgroups commute" predicate applied to a subgroup sum. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 21-Apr-2016.)
statement:
lsmcntz.p $e |- .(+) = ( LSSum ` G ) $.
lsmcntz.s $e |- ( ph -> S e. ( SubGrp ` G ) ) $.
lsmcntz.t $e |- ( ph -> T e. ( SubGrp ` G ) ) $.
lsmcntz.u $e |- ( ph -> U e. ( SubGrp ` G ) ) $.
lsmcntz.z $e |- Z = ( Cntz ` G ) $.
lsmcntzr $p |- ( ph -> ( S C_ ( Z ` ( T .(+) U ) ) <-> ( S C_ ( Z ` T ) /\ S C_ ( Z ` U ) ) ) ) $.
